Package com.bws.jdistil.core.tag.paging

Class PageNavigation

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
com.bws.jdistil.core.tag.paging.PageNavigation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
public class PageNavigation extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
Component used to display page navigation links.
Author:
- Bryan Snipes
